meanings.definition: Requests for something to be done or provided.
meanings.sent1: The teacher's demands for homework were clear and fair.
meanings.sent2: The demands of the job included answering phone calls and emails.
meanings.sent3: The demands of the picky eater made it challenging to cook dinner.
meanings.sent4: The demands of the project weighed heavily on the team's shoulders.
meanings.sent5: The demands of the marathon race pushed the runners to their limits.

meanings.sent1: She demands a lot of patience when teaching young children.
meanings.sent2: The job demands attention to detail and strong organizational skills.
meanings.sent3: The recipe demands precise measurements to turn out perfectly.
meanings.sent4: His new role demands quick decision-making under pressure.
meanings.sent5: The challenging hike demands physical endurance and mental toughness.

meanings.sent1: The general demands respect from all soldiers under his command.
meanings.sent2: The coach demands discipline and dedication from the team.
meanings.sent3: The toddler demands to be carried everywhere like a little king.
meanings.sent4: The CEO demands excellence in all aspects of the company's operations.
meanings.sent5: The judge demands silence in the courtroom during proceedings.
